text: Allaha tomadera jan'ye tomadera'i madhya theke ekati drstanta barnana karechenah tomadera ami ye ruyi diyechi, tomadera adhikarabhukta dasa-dasira ki tate tomadera samana samana ansidara? Tomara ki taderake serupa bhaya kara, yerupa nijedera lokake bhaya kara? Emanibhabe ami samajhadara sampradayera jan'ye nidarsanabali bistarita barnana kari.
